title: Amazing Stories Volume 07 Number 01
creator: Sloane, Thomas O'Conor, 1851-1940

Harris, John Wyndham Parkes Lucas Beynon, 1903-1969

Meek, Sterner St. Paul, 1894-1972
description: Amazing Stories, volume 7, number 1 (April 1932). Scanned copy of a pulp magazine published by Teck Publishing Corp. and edited by Thomas O'Conor Sloane, Ph.D. Periodical copyright not renewed. Individual contributions' copyrights not renewed. This magazine and its contents are now in the public domain. Featuring: Mechanocracy (Miles J. Breuer), Seven Sunstrokes (Bob Olsen), The Lost Machine (John Wyndham), Cosmic Steeple-Chase (Robert A. Wait), and Troyana (S. P. Meek; 3/3).
